thread.title: COD 1006 Beautiful, large and peaceful home for sale in San Ramón de Tres Ríos
thread.title_full: COD 1006 Beautiful, large and peaceful home for sale in San Ramón de Tres Ríos

author: Mariana
title: COD 1006 Beautiful, large and peaceful home for sale in San Ramón de Tres Ríos
text:
Bathrooms: 5 Or More Parking: 5 Or More 
Simply move into this beautiful house and enjoy! The 14-room, 6,000 sq. ft., peaceful Spanish Colonial home is full of light filtered by stained-glass windows. It includes all the appliances, as well as fireplaces in the living room, library, and master bedroom. There is a laundry room, and a jr. suite off a fully equipped kitchen. Downstairs there are: 4 bedrooms, 5.5. baths, a family room, inner patio with fountain, and an open porch off the family room. This is a secure property in a gated community, beautiful gardens, upper BBQ area under canopy of bougainvillea, two-car garage, carport, parking for 8 more cars. A must-see home! 
Reduced Price: $1,300,000 to $840,000
